reviews.review: Jeu excellent ! Si vous voulez vous éclatez avec des potes ou en solo et avoir des frissons, des moments de stresse et de soulagement.  Les parties ne sont pas longues, donc une de temps en temps ça fais toujours plaisir, et il y a surtout une bonne communauté qui est très rare sur les jeux d'aujourd'hui.

Leider momentan unspielbar aufgrund unzähliger Bugs und die meisten davon betreffen nichtmal das Gameplay. Es ist überhaupt erstmal eine Qual eine Lobby zu finden. Das Menü ist dabei so buggy, dass man manchmal das Spiel nur noch beenden kann weil einfach gar nichts mehr geht. Wen  man dann mal eine Lobby gefunden hat, kommt man manchmal in den Ladebildschirm of Doom um nach 10 Minuten Wartezeit wieder im Hauptmenü zu landen....
Es gibt zudem keine Server, sondern der Killer ist immer der Host. Sprich: Killer + Bambusleitung = abenteuerliches Spieleerlebnis. 

Wenn diese Probleme mal behoben, bzw. angepasst werden würde ich das Spiel jederzeit empfehlen. Wenn man mal ans spielen kommt ist es wirklich ein Genuss, trotz manchmal nervender Camper Killer oder unkameradschaftlicher Teammates. 

Da die aktuellen Bugs aber das Spielvergnügen erheblich bremsen, gibts von mir leider einen Daumen nach unten.

EDIT: Inzwischen sind einige der oben beschriebenen Bugs behoben. Es wird noch viel an der Entwicklung gearbeit und auch Gameplayteschnich wird noch viel gewerkelt. Alles in allem kann ich das Spiel aber derzeit sehr empfehlen.
!!!Nice game!!!Buy!!!

nice

This game is pretty decent, has a lot of potential in it but the BUGS, lag and the terrible matchmaking system are killing it.
Every second game the host (killer) lags horrendously - it's impossible to say what is going on when you teleport all over the place. During the evening the queue becomes so terrible, you can't join the game and then when you re-q again the game freezes - the waiting screen stays for ages and you have to kill the program and start it again. 
Seriously, at the current state this game is not even fit for an early access and they are releasing DLCs without fixing the major gamebreaking bugs.
Update on 24.07.2022:
Instead of fixing the bugs, the terrible rubberbanding, cheating and etc. bs, the Mathieu Cote & Co. decided to completely screw the balance of the game. They have buffed the killers so many times and the last patch 6.1.0.is "balanced" for full premade groups with Voip vs Killers.
Well good luck with that! Time to go to greener pastures.

I tried this game a few months ago and refunded, but then  I played it again  for a free weekend and I got hooked.  The game took a turn for the better, definetely. Being a survivor is atmospheric, intense, and in every way thrilling. You have to outsmart the killer, knocking down boards, hiding, vaulting over things and even escaping his grasp. But don't get me wrong, survivors are pretty weak and its easy to get caught by the killer(SKILL CHECKS!) Or you can play as the big scary Wraith, Nurse, Trapper, and others. Even though it may seem "easy" to be a killer, you can be slowed easily and its hard to focus on getting all 4 people while they are trying their guts out (literally and figuratively) to LIVE! However, the killers are very strong and can easily overcome all 4 survivors if skilled enough. Either role, killer or survivor, the game is great and should be played. I can't say much about flaws yet because I haven't played the game enough. Anyway, RECOMMENDED! However there is a glaring flaw I have noticed with more time played which is queueing for a match. It can be a bit annoying at times when it takes 10 or so minutes to find a match(only on occasion) but when that happens, it sometimes just kicks you out of the lobby, because of an impatient host or something. Which is fine, its just somedays ill be trying for like 20 to 30 minutes to find a match and  I simply won't find a match! Other days, it goes smoothly and I find a match pretty quickly. But in the end, its a minor flaw and it doesnt hinder my enjoyment of the game. Only one time, I have waited for a match for 10 or so minutes, I was in the middle of loading screen with the tally marks before the game actually started and boom the game crashed. But that was the only time that ever happened, and I would still definetely recommend this great game.

Edit: I have only played 2 games with this new ranking system, however I do NOT like it. I preferred the old ranking system and honestly do not understand why they changed it.
Edit 2: They have changed the ranking system but to a modified form of what it originally was, but I like it. Please keep it that way developers!

If you encounter bugs when queueing alone then use "Survive with friends" even if you play alone.

I really hope devs will fix the numerous problems their game have.
Melhor compra que fiz, Pode ter diversos bugs e alguns kilers idiotas de vez em quando, mas mesmo assim vale todo o tempo nesse jogo é divertido é emocionante realmente recomendo :)
Spend more time trying to get into a game than actually playing

Das Game an sich ist gut, aber die Tatsache das man nicht auf Rank spielen kann, da einem wegen jedem Scheiß Punkte verliert (Zb. wenn der Killer nen dc hat) oder einfach so. Ich zb war rank 16. Nach der Runde hat sich das Game (mal wieder) aufgehangen und jetzt bin ich (aus irgendwelchen Mathematischen Gründen) Wieder rank 19 mit 0 Punkten. Das spiel ist ganz ok wenn mans mit Freunden spielen möchte aber 20€ ist das Game einfach nicht wert. Zudem braucht es manchmal 6-7 Versuche in eine Lobby zu kommen. Der neue Killer is unballanced bzw pay to win und zudem gibt es keinen Support bei dem man irgendwelche Bugs melden kann.
cool
its okay.

PROS:

*The gameplay is fun, simple but exciting.

*Different Killers and victims with different skills etc.

*Mapdesign is good, but it gets boring after a while.

CONS:

* Playing with friends (This is the main reason i won't recommend this game) does NOT work. tried with a group of 4 to connect and play together, it worked 1 out of the 10 times we tried. Either we where missing a killer, or we were thrown out of the lobby and back to main menu. Eventually we had to give up and play all for ourselves in quick match etc.

* Playing alone does NOT work properly, after 3 or 4 matches the game will crash or you will get an infinite loading screen.

* Character customization is lacking.

* Small but annoying things with the matchmaking, like when that match is over, there is no way for you to rematch with the same people/group, instead you have to exit to main menu starting the whole process again with waiting in lobby etc.

This game has a lot of potential, and i am sure that most of the negative stuff will be fixed after a while.
Good Game :)

Un bon jeu, pas un triple A mais il y a moyen de s'amuser probablement un bon moment.

Que lui manque-t-il?

_des graphisme un peu de meilleurs qualité... parce-que meme en ultra ça pique les yeux...

_des objectifs différents, parce-que mettre en route des générateurs... accrocher des types a des crochets... bon on peut vite se lasser, heureusement que le gameplay est simple, et que selon votre role, l'expérience change un petit peu.

_revoir aussi le principe du jeu en lui-même serait un plus... eviter de perdre une partie parce-qu'un type se jette dans les bras de son boureau toutes les 30 secondes... faire en sorte de varier les styles de jeu entre les tueurs.
parce-que le camping est nettement encourager pour eux (piège; teleportation; principe même des crochets)
Par exemple faire que le piège ne commence a se refermer sur la victime du crochet que si le tueur est a une certaine distance de sécurité...

_changer les manières de tuer!!! parce-que les crochets ça va 5 minutes! ya des broyeuses, des pinces , des brasiers etc... mais que pour faire joli :(

allez d'ici quelques temps je suis sur que le jeu evolura vers quelque-chose de mieux, croisons les doigts.

Et puis pourquoi pas d'autres tueurs tout droit sorti du ciné des 80's ;) un fred krueger, ou un jason... pourquoi pas...

Overall, despite not playing it much anymore this remains my favourite game and i always return and have a week of non-stop playing. 

The game has a dedicated fan-base with constant updates and added content including franchises such as silent hill and stranger things. 

Fun to play by yourself or with a friend.

Dead by Daylight!

O que eu tenho para falar sobre esse jogo maravilhoso, Bom vamos começar falando sobre a incrivel diversidade de Personagems tanto a quantidade de Sobreviventes quanto as de Assasinos, Esse jogo e muito bom mesmo nao so pela sua incrivel diversidade, E sim pela diversidade de tudo mesmo Personagems, Perks, Mapas, Itens, Oferendas e ETC, Esse jogo por ano lançam 3 a 4 Assasinos e Sobreviventes novos, O jogo em si e um pouco bugado, Fora que o sistema de Host nao e muito bom, Porque quem hosteia e o Assasino, Dai a unica experança e que o Assasino tenha uma otima internet, Senão a partida vai ser uma virar um incrivel episodio de Dragon Ball, Bom mais fora esses pequenos bugs tambem temos os malditos Campers, Esses caras são muito toxicos, Infelizmente os donos do Jogo falam que Camperar e apenas uma Tecnica para os players que jogam de Assasino, Bom isso nao deixa de ser verdade, Mais nao da para jogar contra campers, Fica impossivel de se jogar com esses caras, Você acaba perdendo pontos no Rank porcausa desses caras, Seria otimo pelo menos ter uma penalidade para esses campers, Mais enfim tirando os campers o jogo tem os Perks que são nada mais, Nada menos que coisas que você aprende na sua Teia de Sangue (BloodWeb) comprando com os seus Pontos de Sangue (BloodPoints), Você compra os Perks e acaba aprendendo novas tecnicas que te ajudam a jogar, E cada personagem tem 3 Perks proprios porem você pode ensinar para os outros personagems, O jogo mesmo você tem que investir seu tempo, Senão você nao consegue fazer muita coisa nele, E so questão de dedicação, O jogo e muito bom pra jogar com os amigos e conhecer amigos, Eu mesmo ja conheci muitos otimos amigos graças a esse jogo.

I waited ages to buy this game. It was on offer so I bought it. I first started playing as the killer. Leveled him up quite quickly and enjoyed the game. Then I thought I would try the survivor. Unfortunatly this was not so much fun. Just trying to get into a game as a survivor is next to impossable. Constant "failed to join lobby". And if that wasnt bad enough the game would somehow put itself on a constant waiting loop that you can't get out of without task manager and end task. So after closing the game and reloading you might get one game in. but after that, the same thing, "failed to join lobby" waiting loop. 
I decided to look this up, and low and behold this looks like a common problem. Many have reported this problem and from what I can gather from the responses is, the devs don't seem to be interested in sorting out this problem.
It is a great shame, because what I could play of this game was fun.

Gioco di per sé validissimo, sviluppato su un'idea ottima di creare un gioco "horror" multiplayer.
E' divertente da giocare ma non facilissimo, richiede una certa abilità ed è proprio questo uno dei suoi punti di forza, una partita tira l'altra specialmente se lo si gioca con gli amici ma presenta dei difetti che rovinano il gioco: per prima cosa nel gioco ci sono diversi bug che in alcuni momenti sono davvero fastidiosi, come per esempio il fatto di trovare casse non apribili, oppure di venire colpiti dal mostro anche se ci si trova abbastanza lontani o dietro un muretto e mi è capitato anche di salvare un mio compagno e vederlo morire a caso subito dopo, a mio parere il killer è troppo forte e molto spesso se ti vedrà farai fatica a scappare anche perchè lui è più veloce, il sistema di ranking aggiunge competizione al gioco ma il rank che ottieni viene azzerato ogni mese quindi gli sforzi vengono vanificati per non parlare poi dei giocatori con perk molto più forti che si incontreranno a causa del matchmaking che tiene conto solo del ranking (viene sempre azzerato quindi i giocatori non sono sullo stesso piano per quanto riguarda le abilità e gli oggetti).
Un altro difetto è che non presenta server dedicati e ad hostare la partita sarà il killer che non avrà sempre una buona connessione, server dedicati no?!
Detto questo SCONSIGLIO il gioco fino a quando non verranno risolti tutti questi problemi che rovinano il gioco.
